reviewText:
i bought this from amazon but its not showing ?
its a great scary show which shows the future
It's a wonder why it was cancelled! Such a wonderful show! Thrilling, interesting, exciting!  I laughed, I cried, I loved it!

I use to love this show! I purchased the complete series a while ago. Good show for kids/tweens.
26 episodes
3 discs
2 seasons

This series is really neat as clues to the characters life are given in the form of a magic comic book.  Probably this was before Heroes or other series that used the concept.  Great teen series, excellent teen actors and entertaining!!!!  Thanks Mill Creek for another affordable series!!!!

The first season they just screw around and nothing is done. The second season is better but characterization varies from episode to episode. The story is pretty unique combining comic animation with live action. Special effects are pretty good. Another thing that bothers me is that there are necromancers but they don't do anything related to the field. Still the show is entertaining.

Since my son & I love watching shows like Tower Prep and Unnatural History it sounded ideal (and the price was very right) so I thought I'd give it a shot as a present for his 13th birthday.  We both became addicted to it immediately (as did one of his friends who usually think what we like to watch is lame) and will probably be a "go to" video when boredom sets in meaning that we'll probably watch it more than once.

My kids used to watch this series when they were younger and were thrilled to receive the DVD for Christmas. Service was great, item was mailed out quickly and was here in plenty of time for the holidays . Thanks!
